snippet: Jeremy Lin, an Asian-American Harvard graduate, couldn’t find a role in the league. Then he scored 53 points in two games for the Knicks.
abstract: New York Knicks guarantee a contract for guard Jeremy Lin, Asian-American Harvard graduate whose surprisingly strong performances in his last two starts with the Knicks have bolstered his status as a legitimate NBA-caliber talent; Lin was largely ignored by professional teams after graduating, and now the qualities that make him unique and may have held him back have turned him into a sensation.
lead_paragraph: Jeremy Lin, an Asian-American Harvard graduate, couldn’t find a role in the league. Then he scored 53 points in two games for the Knicks.

headline.seo: Jeremy Lin Has Burst From N.B.A. Novelty Act to Knicks Star
headline.main: From Ivy Halls to the Garden, Surprise Star Jolts the N.B.A.
headline.print_headline: From Ivy Halls to the Garden, Surprise Star Jolts the N.B.A.
